name: Rather Ragey
description:
What if Pacman stumbled himself into a randomly generated dungeons designed to annihilate anyone daring to impose?

Features:

  • Randomly generated levels, increasing in size as you descend further
  • 5 different enemy types to fear
  • 6 different crate upgrades to unlock or find in the depths
  • Boosting mechanic to increase your speed or slow down time itself
  • Unlockable shortcuts for those who dare return to use them

Available for free on Windows

The main theme in-game is by Routtmeister.

Everything else by OmnipotentPotato.
